## CookieService class

Class that is used as wrapper for working with cookies

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class CookieService 
```

|  --- | --- | --- |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [deleteCookie(name, path, domain)](./common.cookieservice.deletecookie.md) |  | Removes specified Cookie |
|  [getCookie(name, skipSerialization)](./common.cookieservice.getcookie.md) |  | Retrieves a single cookie by it's name |
|  [setCookie(name, value, expires, path, domain, skipSerialization)](./common.cookieservice.setcookie.md) |  | Save the Cookie |
